sentence.Network_en: Too much time was spent discussing tangential issues.
sentence.Network_cn: 太多的时间花在了讨论那些无关紧要的问题上。

sentence.Network_en: They thought the whole thing was a side-show, tangential to the real world of business.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们认为整件事情只是一个插曲，和真正的商界没有多大关系。

sentence.Network_en: The forces in operation have the form of lateral or tangential thrust.
sentence.Network_cn: 作用力的形式是侧向冲断或切向冲断.

entry.tran: 关系不大的;不直接相干的
entry.def: If you describe something as tangential, you mean that it has only a slight or indirect connection with the thing you are concerned with, and is therefore not worth considering seriously.

example.ex: Too much time was spent discussing tangential issues...
example.tran: 太多的时间花在了讨论那些无关紧要的问题上。

example.ex: They thought the whole thing was a side-show, tangential to the real world of business.
example.tran: 他们认为整件事情只是一个插曲，和真正的商界没有多大关系。

entry.def: If something is tangential to something else, it is at a tangent to it.

example.ex: ...point T, where the demand curve is tangential to the straight line L.
example.tran: 需求曲线和直线 L 相切之点 T

example.ex: ...the street tangential to the courthouse square.
example.tran: 和法院大楼广场相切的那条大街

sentences.sentence: "a digressive allusion to the day of the week"

means.word_mean: 2. of or relating to or acting along or in the direction of a tangent;

auth_sentence.content: He played only a tangential role in all this.
auth_sentence.res_content: He played only a tangential role in all this.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He played only a tangential role in all this.

auth_sentence.content: Reporting...is seriously deficient in areas tangential to the main argument.
auth_sentence.res_content: Reporting...is seriously deficient in areas tangential to the main argument.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Reporting...is seriously deficient in areas tangential to the main argument.

auth_sentence.content: His book is erudite but readable, delightfully tangential, and surprisingly polemical.
auth_sentence.res_content: His book is erudite but readable, delightfully tangential, and surprisingly polemical.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His book is erudite but readable, delightfully tangential, and surprisingly polemical.
